name: The Floow
goal: We are a Telematics company with a truly global reach based in Sheffield, North of England. Our unique technologies, insights and digital products help market leaders in insurance and automotive industries across the world bring the latest telematics technologies to their customers.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation, Transport
